articles.title: 5 Instant Takeaways from Virginia Tech's 24-11 Loss to No. 13 South Carolina - 247Sports
articles.description: Hokies drop season opener in Atlanta despite strong defensive effort
articles.content: ATLANTA – Virginia Tech's 2025 season opener ended with familiar frustration. The Hokies hung around against No. 13 South Carolina for three quarters, but execution errors, special teams breakdowns a… [+1607 chars]
